versionA.text:
You will see 5 variations of t_test questions in the following pages, this is part 1 which is an orignal practice question from the end-of-chapter textbook. You can choose to discuss with your partner or solve the question by yourself and compare the answer. 
 
 Twenty-two stroke patients performed a maze task. The mean number of trials for success was 14.7 with s = 6.2. If the population mean (μ) for this task is 6.5, discuss with your partner and enter the calculated value for t.
